description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"fob0f","text":"1 Send us your protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84lng","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et5qi","text":"2 We enter and check your protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kuc1","text":"
Our editorial team will enter the protocol and double check it to make sure there are no errors or typos relative to the document that you provided.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jhmh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lhi4","text":"3 Ready for your review.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f29np","text":"
We will send you the protocol for review.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm5np","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aak5u","text":"4 Edit and/or publish at any time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g250","text":"
If all looks good, the protocol will be reassigned to you privately and you can then further edit (add photos/videos/keywords or tweak steps) and decide whether to publish the protocol or share it privately with colleagues whenever you're ready.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e0f89","text":"Si desea enviar un protocolo existente a protocols.io, visite primero la siguiente pagina de internet: https://www.protocols.io/we-enter-protocols","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":103,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":103,"length":43}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"02AB3C6DCA3D11EC89580A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/we-enter-protocols"}}}}
